attributes.action: stop borrowing massive amounts of money that is crippling this country. We the undersigned have completely lost all hope in this this borrow obsessed government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any financial expert knows that when you get yourself in debt and your unable to pay your bills seek immediate help and don't get in more debt. This government is doing the opposite and placing us all in massive amounts of debt that will take decades to bring under control. We need to stop borrowing and pay that debt off soon!

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
